sentences.sContent: It is estimated that 60,000 businesses are exploiting a loophole in the law to avoid prosecution.
sentences.sCn: 据估计6万家公司在钻法律的空子来逃避起诉。

synos.tran: 漏洞；枪眼；换气孔；射弹孔

remMethod.val: loop (圈， 环) + hole (洞) → 枪眼

trans.tranCn: 漏洞；枪眼；换气孔；射弹孔
trans.tranOther: a small mistake in a law that makes it possible to avoid doing something that the law is supposed to make you do
